title: Best of The Herd: 01/17/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 01/17/2019
description:
Colin is starting to question the relationship between LeBron James and the Lakers after his agent makes some intense remarks regarding his injury.  He thinks throughout the season the Patriots have been great in big games while the Chiefs have had their struggles.  Plus, Greg Cosell of NFL Films explains how the Rams offense is actually very basic and how Bill Belichick will try to stop Patrick Mahomes.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
